name: Weiran Shen
content: Weiran Shen 中文 Weiran Shen Tenure-Track Associate Professor Gaoling School of Artificial Intelligence Renmin University of China Address: 59 Zhongguancun St. Haidian District Beijing, China Email: shenweiran AT ruc DOT edu DOT cn About me I am an tenure-track associate professor at Gaoling School of Artificial Intelligence, Renmin University of China. Before joining Renmin University, I was a post doctoral researcher at ISR, Carnegie Mellon University, working with Fei Fang. I obtained my Ph.D. at IIIS, Tsinghua University, advised by Pingzhong Tang, and my B.E. at Department of Electronic Engineering, Tsinghua University. My research interest lies in the interface of economics and computation, especially auction and mechanism design, game theory, multi-agent systems and machine learning.
